original_text: And when the men of that place recognized Jesus, they sent word to all the surrounding country. People brought all their sick to him
korean_text: 그 곳 사람들이 예수이신 줄을 알고 그 근방에 두루 통지하여 모든 병든 자를 예수께 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: And when the men of that place recognized Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 곳 사람들이 예수를 알아보았을 때

sentences.original_text: they sent word to all the surrounding country
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 주변 지역에 소식을 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: People brought all their sick to him
